intro_1_DESC: Ready to find your way through the Poster Jungle?
intro_2_DESC: ... and we process the poster for you!
intro_3_DESC: All set with calendar reminder, ticket link and won't forget it with clever in-app reminders.
intro_4_TITLE: But we are not there yet
intro_4_DESC: Please help us find as many posters as possible, we will process them as soon as we are ready
